prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Strings, Synth Pad, Guitar, Piano, Bass, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Organ, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Strings, Synth Pad, Guitar, Piano, Bass - this song has it all, but no Drums.

Style 2:
No Drums, but this song still has a lot to offer with its Organ, Chromatic Percussion, Reed, Strings, Synth Pad, Guitar, Piano, and Bass.

Style 3:
This composition features an array of instruments - Organ, Chromatic
